biography.bio: France Dhélia was born on November 9, 1894 in Saint-Lubin-en-Vergonnois, Loir-et-Cher, France as Franceline Berthe Léontine Delia Benoit. She was an actress, known for La sultane de l'amour (1919), Sa tête (1929) and Oiseaux de passage (1925). She died on May 6, 1964 in Paris, France.
biography.name: France Dhélia

biography.bio: Sylvio De Pedrelli is an actor, known for Survivre (1923), Tristan et Yseult (1920) and L'épervier (1925).
biography.name: Sylvio De Pedrelli

biography.bio: Yvonne Sergyl was born on September 10, 1896 in Constantine, Algeria. She is an actress, known for L'homme n'est pas parfait (1916), La roche aux mouettes (1933) and Miracle of the Wolves (1924).
biography.name: Yvonne Sergyl

biography.bio: Gaston Modot was born on December 30, 1887 in Paris, France as Gaston Victor Modot. He was an actor and writer, known for L'Age d'Or (1930), La Grande Illusion (1937) and Children of Paradise (1945). He died on February 24, 1970 in Paris.
biography.name: Gaston Modot

biography.bio: Albert Bras was born on August 10, 1865 in Geneva, Switzerland. He was an actor, known for Vampyr (1932), The Oppressed (1923) and Les Rantzau (1923). He died on September 29, 1942 in London, England.
biography.name: Albert Bras

biography.bio: Dourga is an actress, known for Le soleil noir (1918), La sultane de l'amour (1919) and La danzatrice d'Oriente (1921).
biography.name: Dourga

biography.placeOfBirth: Lublin, Poland, Russian Empire [now Lublin, Lubelskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Armand Dutertre was born on July 17, 1854 in Lublin, Poland, Russian Empire [now Lublin, Lubelskie, Poland] as Boleslaw Kamil Plucinski. He was an actor, known for Un drame de l'air (1913), Au paradis des enfants (1918) and Chef d'école (1914). He died on May 31, 1932 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France.
biography.name: Armand Dutertre

biography.bio: Marcel Lévesque was born on December 6, 1877 in Paris, France. He was an actor and writer, known for Les vampires (1915), The Crime of Monsieur Lange (1936) and For the Children (1916). He died on February 16, 1962 in Couilly-Pont-aux-Dames, Seine-et-Marne, France.
biography.name: Marcel Lévesque

biography.bio: Le Nain Frankeur is an actor, known for La sultane de l'amour (1919) and Tristan et Yseult (1920).
biography.name: Le Nain Frankeur

biography.bio: Pillot is an actor, known for La sultane de l'amour (1919) and Les mystères de Paris (1922).
biography.name: Pillot

biography.bio: Paul Vermoyal was born on October 18, 1888 in Braye-en-Laonnois, Aisne, France as Pierre Paul Vermoyal. He was an actor, known for Le droit à la vie (1917), Les mouettes (1917) and La nuit du 11 septembre (1922). He died on September 28, 1925 in Amélie-les-Bains, Pyrénées-Orientales, France.
biography.name: Paul Vermoyal
